author: irina_everstake
content:
Hello everyone! 

As Ethereum celebrates 9 years since its genesis, I took a helicopter view of the events that made up Ethereum's history over the past nine years and what it may become tomorrow, as well as summarized the staking ecosystem as of mid-2024.

Happy to share with you my material on this: https://stake.is/ethereum-is-nine-d

If any question or something worth mentioning was missed, let me know ðŸ™Œ
